description:
Yuu and the others help Ahegao Double Peace-sensei at a doujinshi exhibition. There they encounter the Kanzaki sisters who run a major circle. After getting caught up in the sore relationship between them and Ahegao Double Peace-sensei, Yuu gets roped into a doujinshi competition!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moi et ma sœur à la fête de la culture du collège pour filles Hakuô
Ore to Imouto no Hakuou Jogakuin Bunkasai
Our Hakuou Girl`s School Culture Festival
俺と妹の白桜女学院文化祭
